headline: Pfizer CEO Mentioned No Drug Price Commitments by Pfizer Inc. (PFE)
summary: Pfizer Inc. (NYSE:PFE) is one of the best wide moat stocks to buy now. On June 9, Pfizer, along with other drug manufacturers, had a meeting with the Trump administration to talk about reducing US drug prices. However, Pfizer’s chief executive, Albert Bourla, mentioned that no commitments have been agreed upon. President Trump ordered drugmakers last […]

headline: Pfizer says drugmakers met with Trump admin to discuss lowering drug prices
summary: Pfizer (PFE) and other drugmakers met with the Trump administration to discuss lowering U.S. drug prices but no commitments have been made, Pfizer CEO Albert Bourla said on Monday at the Goldman Sachs Healthcare Conference. Boula said the meetings “were cordial,” but they were not “digging into the substance yet,” adding that “it is just trying to understand high-level ideas and no commitments. So what could be the outcomes of something like that? It could be from nothing to very big.”” Publishe
